summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5569 for the improvement of 34th Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to East 70th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 72789, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
